DOC.criteria: weight stable overweight obese ( BMI â‰¥ 25kg/m2 ) nondiabetic individual , age 1850 year healthy accord medical history , blood biochemistry physical examination . Participants exclude : age < 18 year > 50 year ; currently smoke , high alcohol use ; positive urine drug screen test ; history : diabetes , cardiovascular hematological disease , respiratory , gastrointestinal , endocrine , renal central nervous system disease , psychosis psychiatric disorder , active cancer within last 5 year . actively seek lose weight , weight change 10 kilogram previous 12 month . take medication within one month prior commence study ; acute inflammation ( history , physical laboratory examination ) hormonal contraceptive , pregnant ( HCG urine pregnancy screen test ) lactate highly unusual dietary habit follow vegan diet ( difficulty comply assign diet ) . current diabetes ( determined history and/or 75g glucose OGTT ) unable provide inform consent
